Hi: I am able to ping my windows server on my local network, 192.168.3.20. how can I access it from a file browser?
the nautilus file manager can access samba shares,  browse them, or use the address  bar directly (ctrl-l) then  smb://servername-or-ip-number/sharename
you could try the 'alien' command to convert it.. but that can be dangerous to the healty of your system
